name: BattleshipAI
description: A battleship game (Schiffe versenken) with a learning AI in the making. As part of the AI course with Prof. Franz Kurfess in the summer term 2015 at hm.edu. See the wiki [here](https://github.com/benjaminaaron/BattleshipAI/wiki).
author: stehrenberg, chanton1392, jpb11, benjaminaaron
